com.jaap.antitowerdefence.level

Class LevelReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jaap.antitowerdefence.level.LevelReader

  • public class LevelReader
extends java.lang.Object
    LevelReader.java A XML-reader that takes a level file (xml) for the game Anti Tower Defence, checks if the file is valid and, if so, parse the file. The file is validated with a xml-schema, "levelsSchema.xsd".The class contains functions for retrieving information about the game levels. If the given xml-file is not valid a default file is used.
    Author:
    Anna Osterlund, id10aod

    • Constructor Detail

      • LevelReader

        public LevelReader(java.lang.String levelFile)
            throws javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException,
                   org.xml.sax.SAXException,
                   java.io.IOException
        LevelReader constructor. Creates the xml-reader with the given file name. Validates ande parse the file. Sets nrOfLevels and the level maps dimensions.
        Parameters:
        levelFile - - file containing valid Anti Tower Defence levels
        Throws:
        javax.xml.parsers.ParserConfigurationException - - Error while parsing the level file
        java.io.IOException - - Error while creating the docBuilder
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - - Error while creating the docBuilder

    • Method Detail

      • getRoad

        public java.util.concurrent.CopyOnWriteArrayList<Terrain> getRoad(int currentLevel)
        getRoad extracts all the walkable positions, road, start and goal, of a given level from the level file. Constructs terrain objects using these positions, saves the objects in a Terrain ArrayList and returns the array.
        Parameters:
        currentLevel - - the level to extract the positions from
        Returns:
        an ArrayList with walkable Terrain objects or null

      • getGrass

        public Terrain[] getGrass(int currentLevel)
        getGrass extracts all the grass positions of a given level from the level file. Constructs grass objects using these positions and saves the objects in a Terrain array and returns the array.
        Parameters:
        currentLevel - - the level to extract the positions from
        Returns:
        - an array of Grass objects or null

      • getLevelStats

        public LevelStats getLevelStats(int currentLevel)
        getLevelStats extracts the start conditions of a given level. It constructs a LevelStat object with the extracte information and returns this object.
        Parameters:
        currentLevel - - the level to extract information about
        Returns:
        - A LevelStat object containing the start conditions of the level or null

      • getNrOfTowers

        public int getNrOfTowers(int currentLevel)
        gerNrOfTowers extracts information from the level file about the nr of towers to be implemented in the given level.
        Parameters:
        currentLevel - - the level to extract information about
        Returns:
        - number of towers in the level

        public java.lang.String[] getUnits(int currentLevel)

        Returns:
